text: Khora is a town in Ghaziabad district in Uttar Pradesh India. The population is approx 1,000,000 (2016). It is located on NH-24 in Ghaziabad district of state Uttar Pradesh near Noida and Delhi. The area of Khora Colony is approx 10 sq. k.m. It comes under the purview of the National Capital Region of India. It is bound on the west and southwest by the Ghazipur (Delhi) , on the north and northwest by Hindon Canal, on the northeast by the Indirapuram, and on the east and south-east by Noida.
